parts.text: I want to make a React application with Tailwind CSS. This application is a calendar. Output just the JSX file.
make an autonomous HTML from this JSX file.

Certainly! Below is an HTML representation of the React component. I've transformed the JSX into plain HTML using static content: ```html Calendar

Calendar

Mon
Tue
Wed
Thu
Fri
Sat

``` ### How to Use - Include the Tailwind CSS CDN link in the `` section to apply styling. - This is a static HTML file showcasing November's days. You can modify it to reflect other months by changing the numbers as needed.
